name: @neuroio/api
description: Library for work with Neuroio API

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix packages/neuroio-rest-api && npm install --prefix packages/neuroio-websocket && npm install
scripts.ci:all: npm ci --prefix packages/neuroio-rest-api && npm ci --prefix packages/neuroio-websocket && npm ci
scripts.test:all: npm test --prefix packages/neuroio-rest-api && npm test --prefix packages/neuroio-websocket
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test:all && npm run prettier -- --list-different

author: Dmitriy Balashov <mockedcat@gmail.com>
